markdownRemark.html:
This is a song I remied for a Creative Commons contest, remixing Superego by BM Relocation Program. My remix wasn't selected, but I did get a free t-shirt! I'd love to know what you think: [kmlflashembed movie="http://www.docunext.com/blog/singlemp3player.swf?file=http://www-sa.evenserver.com/s/img/2006/12/superegoremixall.mp3" height="20" width="400" /]

This song incorporates not only parts of the original, but also included several OYEZ samples, which are released to the public domain.

Copy Me Remix Me

Blog entry by Matt Haughey, October 22nd, 2003

Like the original, this song was released under an Attribution-ShareAlike 1.0.

frontmatter.title: Creative Commons Copy Me Remix Me
